codeSystems.name: TocDelLoincTermsAnsweredByLL5571
codeSystems.title: Transitions of Care LOINC Terms Included in the DEL Answered by LL5571-6 Answer List Value Set
codeSystems.description: This value set includes those LOINC terms that included in the DEL which are defined to be answered by LOINC answer list LL5571-6.

codeSystems.name: TocDELItemsLOINC
codeSystems.title: Transitions of Care DEL LOINC Terms Value Set
codeSystems.description: This value set includes those LOINC terms that are used by the DEL.

codeSystems.name: TocLoincTermsAnsweredByLL5571
codeSystems.title: Transitions of Care LOINC Terms Answered by LL5571-6 Answer List Value Set
codeSystems.description:
This value set includes those LOINC terms that are defined to be answered by LOINC answer list LL5571-6.

  Ideally, this could be intensionally defined as terms where the answer-list property is "LL5571-6", however at publication time, this property is not supported by the FHIR terminology server at tx.fhir.org.
